welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Xalatlaco, the charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. Get ready to immerse yourself in the sights, sounds, and flavors of our beautiful city. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Licenciado Adolfo Lopez Mateos International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Licenciado Adolfo Lopez Mateos International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The original terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, mainly serving international flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 60 minutes per device per day.
